item.title: Exploiting Google Gemini's Memory with Prompt Injection and Delayed Tool Invocation
item.description: A while ago Google added memories to Gemini. Memories allow Gemini to store user-related data across sessions, storing information in long-term memory. The feature is only available to users who pay for Gemini Advanced. So, in the fall of last year I chimed in and paid for the subscription for a month to check it out. As a user you can see what Gemini stored about you at https://gemini.google.com/saved-info.
